page.title: 06Shopping Facilities,Earlston
page.content: Earlston is a small place with small shops.Our main shop,the co-operative, sells groceries and delicatessen. There is a shop which sells fish, poultry,cakes,cream,milk,spices,fruit and vegetables.A chemist makes up prescriptions and sells toiletries, medicine and gifts.An agricultural shop sells fertilizer,animal feeding and garden tools.The butcher sells meat,eggs,tinned foods,frozen foods and pastry.There are two newsagents. One is larger than the other.They sell newspapers and greetings cards.There are two electrical shops with spare parts and second hand equipment.Among the remaining shops there is a general store,a dairy,two hairdressers and a newly opened hot food takeaway shop.
